about_the_game:
Find the right words to say in Desta: The Memories Between, a cosy team-based tactics adventure. Encounter old friends, unlock new abilities, land trick-shots to resolve memories, all while falling deeper into a mysterious world. Dream Team Edition includes all updates, artbook and OST.

The Art of Dreams - The Making of Desta: The Memories Between is a beautiful 50+ page Digital Art Book. As a first for ustwo games, this Art Book shows the development journey of Desta - from its earliest conceptions, to the final game today - showcasing the artistic and creative evolution the game went on.

The full book explores every aspect of the game and its visual design, accompanied throughout with annotations to highlight the dreamy visuals of the game.

If you are a fan of ustwo games, indie games, and game development, then our Digital Art Book is for you - packed with seven chapters full of information and never-before-seen artwork!
